text: phir (he nabee!) aap dekhenge ki jinake dilon mein (dvidha ka) rog hai, ve unheen mein daude ja rahe hain, ve kahate hain ki ham darate hain ki ham kisee aapada ke kuchakr mein na aa jaayen, to door nahin ki allaah unhen vijay pradaan karega athava usake paas se koee baat ho jaayegee, to ve log us baat par, jo unhonne apane man mein chhupa rakhee hai, lajjit honge
